itemdesc-minibackpack: Mini backpack made from a basket, rope, twine or cloth.
itemdesc-tallbackpack: Upgraded Mini backpack with a large bottom pocket.
itemdesc-basicbackpack: Upgraded Basic backpack with two top side pockets and one large bottom pocket.
itemdesc-superbackpack: Upgraded Tall backpack with a large bottom pocket.
itemdesc-megabackpack: Upgraded Super backpack with 2 large side pockets.
itemdesc-ultrabackpack: Upgraded Mega backpack with 3 large pockets.
itemdesc-tallleatherbackpack: Upgraded Mini leather backpack with 4 small side pockets
itemdesc-basicleatherbackpack: Upgraded Basic leather backpack with 2 front pockets
itemdesc-superleatherbackpack: Upgraded Tall leather backpack with 2 front pockets and top pocket
itemdesc-megaleatherbackpack: Upgraded Super leather backpack with 2 front pockets, top pocket and 2 side pockets
itemdesc-ultraleatherbackpack: Upgraded Mega leather backpack with 2 front pockets, top pocket, 2 side pockets and one large front pocket
